How to fund your account in 3 easy steps

Open the Cashier or click on the Deposit button on the top right.

Choose from the selection of payments.

Specify the amount you want to deposit, fill out details, and follow the on-screen prompts to confirm payment.

Once approved, the deposit amount will appear in your Deriv [CURRENCY] balance and you can begin trading.
